subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Williams, the women’s No. 1 seed, beat Margarita Gasparyan, 6-4, 6-1, and Djokovic, the men’s No. 1, took care of Philipp Kohlschreiber, 6-4, 6-4, 6-4.
snippet: Williams, the women’s No. 1 seed, beat Margarita Gasparyan, 6-4, 6-1, and Djokovic, the men’s No. 1, took care of Philipp Kohlschreiber, 6-4, 6-4, 6-4.
